title: WTB: The last three T206 commons I need
author: AndyG09

posts.post_title: WTB: The last three T206 commons I need
posts.post_content:
I am down to needing 16 cards to get to 518.  I was hoping somebody might have the following commons I need.

Jack Dunn
Steamer Flanagan
Billy Purtell

Looking for SGC 40-60 or good candidates to crossover.  I have a few dupes I could trade as well.  Thank you very much for looking!

Best,

Andy
unfortunately i dont have any you need :(

Thank you very much Mark or Anthony!  Been a great journey so far!

Best,

Andy

JV!!! Thank you bro!  Hope all is well!

Best,

Andy

if i had all three i would just send them over!!:D

i have purtell, but its in the circus;)

hope u been great!! i'm well and enjoying the holiday....best to you and yours my friend

You the man, Johnny!  All is great here.  Glad to hear all is well with you.  I hope you find a few more freaks for the circus this holiday season!

Best,

Andy

Hi Andy,

Good news -- I've got a duplicate Purtell.  The extra would be the PSA 4 shown below.  Can sell for $55 (including paypal and shipping fees), or happy to trade for one of your duplicates in similar condition.

[IMG]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-4XpiEZBtzVg/TkigdWlSxSI/AAAAAAAANiY/X2v6_A2arSg/s640/T206%2520Purtell%2520-%2520front.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-vIBPm3I_Zbs/Tkif5Cbu0MI/AAAAAAAANik/5lJxTw1DiDY/s640/T206%2520Purtell%2520-%2520rear.jpg[/IMG]

Best of luck on nearing the end of your quest,
--S

Andy - I checked to see if I had dupes of these three and unfortunately I do not. Great job on the set and best of luck finding your final cards!

Jason

Jason, thanks for the comments.  Just trying to follow in your footsteps! :)  Hope all is well with you!

Best,

Andy

Andy

Looking forward to seeing your post on the main board when you have tamed the Monster.

Good luck with the last 3. 



Jantz

Jantz,

Thank you very much!  I still need 16 cards to get there (three are commons).  It has been a great ride so far.  Part of the fun surely has been meeting many of the great guys like yourself here on the board.  Good luck on your quest as well!

Best,

Andy
